sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Reports list

The Reports page shows a platform list of all the reports in your instance. To mark a report as a favorite, click the star icon beside the report title.

Select the gear icon next to the Create a report button to configure the columns displayed in the Reports list.

Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.

Click New to create a new report.

You can filter the Reports list with the following tabs:
  • My reports — Reports that you created.
  • Group — Reports that have been shared with you and with the groups that you are a member of.
  • Global —Reports that are available to everyone.
  • All — All reports that you have access to (Global, Group, and My reports).

The Type column shows an icon with the report type. Point to the icon for information about the report.

The Title column shows the name assigned to the report. The Table column shows the table on which the report is based. The Scheduled column shows a check mark if the report has been scheduled for distribution. The Published column shows a check mark if the report is published to a URL.

Related information
Report types and creation details — Report Designer
Report types and creation details — Report Builder
